familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $201 - $1,000 each in two separate transactions of Dividends Capital Gains income, and None (or less than $201) in (income type not disclosed) income, from HOME DEPOT INC the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser. This asset has been divested.

Jared Kushner received $402 - $2,000 in Dividends Capital Gains income and $0 - $200 in (income type not disclosed) via a third distribution from HOME DEPOT INC the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. Because this asset reportedly has been divested, it is marked as a resolved potential conflict of interest.
